archimate:Requirement.name: MA-4(5): Nonlocal Maintenance | Approvals and Notifications
archimate:Requirement.documentation: (a) Require the approval of each nonlocal maintenance session by [Assignment: organization-defined personnel or roles]; and (b) Notify the following personnel or roles of the date and time of planned nonlocal maintenance: [Assignment: organization-defined personnel or roles].

properties.value: Notification may be performed by maintenance personnel. Approval of nonlocal maintenance is accomplished by personnel with sufficient information security and system knowledge to determine the appropriateness of the proposed maintenance.
